mapper.insert: insert into eventboard (title, contents, admin, img) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{admin}, #{img})
mapper.select: select no, title, thumbimg, year, readcnt, likecount, area from eventboard order by year desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select no, title, writer, year, readcnt from eventboard
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE contents LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or contents LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by no desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select * from eventboard
where year LIKE ('2018%')
where year LIKE ('2019%')
where year LIKE ('2020%')
where year LIKE ('2021%')
order by year desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
